data.price: 25. (Mûssa) alobi: Nkolo wa ngai, fungóla ntolo na ngai,(1)
data.footnotes: 1 Fungóla ntolo na ngai: Elakisi: Tia motema na nga eyamba emoniseli

data.price: 26. Mpe etinda na ngai oyo, tia yango ezala mpete,
28. Mpo bakoka kososola maloba na ngai.

dua.name: Dua for Powerful Intellect
dua.significanceReason: Specifically seeks expansion of intellect, clarity of speech, and deep understanding. Highly sought by students, researchers, and those pursuing mental excellence.
